Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 62nd overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/2015, off Brian Whittingham (KC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/2015, off Demetrio Kabas (NY)...
Drove in 6 runs against Kansas City on 7/6/2015...
Had 6 hits with 3 RBI against St. Louis (B) on 10/12/2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2016, hitting .440 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Brooklyn on 2/11/2017 to a 5-year deal worth $12,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2017, hitting .381 with 5 HR, 9 RBI...
